Public Class InheritanceService Implements IDisposable, IInheritanceService
type InheritanceService = class interface IInheritanceService interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一組方法，識別繼承的元件。

span.span: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來尋找繼承的元件，選取要忽略哪些項目和擷取服務來追蹤每個繼承類別的繼承屬性。The can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.

span.span: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋所有的元件的基底類別的所有欄位。This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component. 實作的每個欄位加入內部清單，其中儲存識別元件的繼承層級。Each field that implements is added to an internal list that stores an that identifies the inheritance level of the component. 該元件再加入指定的容器。The component is then added to the specified container.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫可讓所使用的資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得指定元件的繼承屬性。

span.span: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.

returns.span: ，描述此元件源自於哪一個繼承層級。

span.span: An that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果元件並未繼承，這個方法會傳回值。If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value . 否則，它會傳回這個元件的繼承屬性。Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.

summary.span: 指示是否要略過指定的成員。

span.span: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.

returns.span: 如果指定的成員應該包含在一組繼承的元件中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, .

span.para: 藉由覆寫這個方法，使用者可以修改繼承服務略過的成員集合。預設實作會忽略私用，所有成員，並僅允許公用或受保護的成員。

By overriding this method, users can modify the set of members that the inheritance service ignores. The default implementation ignores all members that are private, and allows only public or protected members.
